name: Sunday Island Express
description:
Deliver mail to the residents of Sunday Island, a land without street names or numbers, so it's up to you to figure out where they live.

Controls

Keyboard and mouse

  • [WASD]: move
  • [Q]: launch mailbag
  • [Escape]: launch game menu
  • [Enter]: submit (dialogue etc)
  • [Mouse]: click buttons

Gamepad

  • [D-pad] or [Left Stick]: move
  • ['North' face button]: mailbag
  • [Start] / [Options]: game menu
  • ['South'] face button: submit (dialogue etc)

Credits

  • Most of the stuff was done by me
  • Pixel art assets using the Serene Village asset pack created by Lime-Zu - https://limezu.itch.io.
  • Character art and animation is from Tiny RPG forest asset pack created by  Ansimuz: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18720

This is an entry for the Lost Relic Game Jam 2022, based around the theme of 'Connection'.
